nodes.bodyText: Sorry, I commented it for debugging. Will remove it.
how about having this return a boolean like the set method?
is the sorting for readability/ease of debugging?

Not really for readability. The Helix bootstrap tool sometimes reported the instanceConfig was updated on existing node (however, we didn't touch those existing nodes). The DiskConfigs in Helix and static were actually same except for ordering. This change should be able suppress such messages (making the BootstrapTool less confusing).

Maybe we could move this method into DataNodeConfig
public boolean equals(DataNodeConfig other, boolean ignorePartitionStateConfigs) (or whatever name you feel is best for the sealed/stopped/disabled fields)
